element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the number of border cells hydrologically connected with each cell. Cells hydrologically connected with one or more border cells are said to be affected by edge contamination, and parameters such as flow accumulation cannot be reliably calculated in them.

element.name: EDGECONT
element.text: The edge contamination layer. Values in each cell represent the number of border cells hydrologically connected to it.
